word_mean: 石：Ca5(PO4)3OH的一种磷酸钙成分，是骨和牙齿的两种矿物质成分之一(另一种为CaCO3)。磷灰石可溶于酸性软饮料及发酵碳水化合物中，而其OH－离子易与某些氟化物中F－离子交换，致使氟化磷灰石不易被酸腐蚀

sentence.Network_en: A kind of bacillus has shown significant ability to decompose apatite.
sentence.Network_cn: 确认了一种芽孢杆菌具有显著的分解磷灰石的能力.

sentence.Network_en: The apatite plays an important role in Xiangshan rich uranium mineralization.
sentence.Network_cn: 相山铀矿田中磷灰石对生成特富铀矿有着十分重要的作用.

sentence.Network_en: The treatment of wastewater containing lead with modified apatite was investigated.
sentence.Network_cn: 对改性磷灰石处理含铅废水进行了研究.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: coined in German from Greek apatē 'deceit' (from the mineral's diverse forms and colours)

means.word_mean: 1. a common complex mineral consisting of calcium fluoride phosphate or calcium chloride phosphate; a source of phosphorus
